name: Akiko
ability: Gain 1 face-up meteorite OR Solve; if you Solve, gain the core value of all your solved quests.

name: Jiro
ability: Activate the previous card’s ability OR Vanquish; if this Vanquish removes the location’s final corruption, you may gain the revealed benefit.

name: Matthew
ability: Gain a yellow worker OR Solve a quest; if you Solve, gain the core value of all your solved quests.

name: Caesar
ability: Move to an adjacent location OR Vanquish; if this Vanquish removes the location’s final corruption, you may gain the revealed benefit.

name: Anna
ability: Gain a face-up quest OR Solve; if you Solve, gain the core value of all your solved quests.

name: Wojtek
ability: Rescue an active card OR Vanquish; if this Vanquish removes the location’s final corruption, you may gain the revealed benefit.

name: Vesna
ability: Gain a face-up item OR Solve; if you Solve, gain the core value of all your solved quests.

name: Voltan
ability: Activate an adjacent face-up card’s ability OR Vanquish; if this Vanquish removes the location’s final corruption, you may gain the revealed benefit.

name: Gunter
ability: Gain a green worker OR Solve; if you Solve, gain the core value of all your solved quests.

name: Nacht
ability: Gain the core value of any other card you control OR Vanquish; if this Vanquish removes the location’s final corruption, you may gain the revealed benefit.

name: Olga
ability: Gain a blue worker OR Solve; if you Solve, gain the core value of all your solved quests.

name: Changa
ability: Gain 1 exposed benefit from an adjacent location OR Vanquish; if this Vanquish removes the location’s final corruption, you may gain the revealed benefit.

name: Scythe
ability: Whenever you gain a worker, also gain [Power].

name: Mitz Valve
ability: Whenever you have 10x[Guile], you may decrease your Guile to 3 and gain $3.

name: Synergy Halo
ability: Whenever you gain at least 2 [Guile] during your turn, also gain [Power].

name: Universal Vise
ability: Whenever you Upgrade this or another item, gain $1 and [Power].

name: Cranial Implant
ability: Whenever you gain an item or meteorite, also gain its core value.

name: Occult Nexus
ability: Whenever you Vanquish, first gain the core values of all adjacent face-up cards.

name: Arcane Blade
ability: Whenever you gain multiple corruption via a single Vanquish, gain $1 for each.

name: Exosuit
ability: Once per turn, if you rescue another card, either gain its core value or activate its ability.

name: Chaos Grenade
ability: Whenever you Vanquish, flip a coin. If it’s heads, gain $2. Otherwise, gain [Guile].

name: Tesla Pistol
ability: Whenever you Vanquish the final corruption from a location, also gain [Power][Guile].

name: Aether Mirror
ability: Whenever you Refresh, gain [Power] or [Guile] per refreshed worker.

name: AwakenedShard
ability: Whenever you play a meteorite, you may activate its ability without placing a worker.

name: Amulet of Bravado
ability: Whenever you have 10x [Power], you may decrease your power to 3 to gain $3.

name: Deceptor Crystal
ability: Whenever you Gather, you may pay [Guile] to include a benefit covered by corruption on your location.

name: Parasitic Gauntlet
ability: Whenever you gain a card, you may pay [Power][Guile] to gain $1.

name: Aether-Vision Goggles
ability: Whenever you gain a map, you may gain [Guile] and rearrange your location’s corruption.

name: Hover Coil
ability: Whenever you Move through an opponent’s location, that player gains [Guile] and you gain $1.

name: Jet Pack
ability: Whenever you Move, you may move through face-down locations without stopping.

name: Riftmask
ability: Once per turn, if you Solve, either gain its core value or activate its ability.

name: Recon Drone
ability: Whenever you Move, you may first either peek at a location within range or gain [Power].

name: Flex Capacitor
ability: Once per turn, if you discard another card, either gain its core value or activate its ability.

name: Portal Orb
ability: Whenever you gain a map, gain $1 if your location number is odd and $2 if it’s even.

name: Dark Prophet Staff
ability: Once per turn, if you gain a card to your active row, you may place a worker on it to activate its ability.

name: Aether Converter
ability: Once per turn, if you Meld a card, either gain its core value or activate its ability.

name: Fusion Link
ability: Whenever you gain at least 2 [Power] during your turn, also gain [Guile].

name: Mindstone
ability: Place a worker on an active card to activate its ability. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per placed worker.

name: Sunstone
ability: Vanquish. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Guile] per 3-value corruption.

name: Yellowstone
ability: Gain 1 face-up yellow card to your hand. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per yellow card you control.
meld: Gain $1 per yellow card you control (max $3).

name: Goldstone
ability: Gather. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per adjacent location.

name: Leechstone
ability: Refresh. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per player.

name: Cluestone
ability: Solve. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per solved quest.

name: Bravestone
ability: Vanquish. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per 4-value corruption.

name: Charterstone
ability: Move to any unoccupied face-up location. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Guile] per adjacent face-up card.

name: Greenstone
ability: Gain 1 face-up green card to your hand. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Guile] per green card you control.
meld: Gain $1 per green card you control (max $3).

name: Mapstone
ability: Gain a map from the general supply. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per map.

name: Redstone
ability: Gain 1 face-up red card to your hand. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Guile] per red card you control.
meld: Gain $1 per red card you control (max $3).

name: Aidstone
ability: Vanquish. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Guile] per orange corruption.

name: Herostone
ability: Discard a card to gain its core value. 2 [PurpleArrow] Rescue the previous card.
meld: Gain $1 per color among cards in hand.

name: Queststone
ability: Gain 1 face-up quest to your hand. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Guile] per quest you control.

name: Alanstone
ability: Gain a worker. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Guile] per available worker.

name: Brainstone
ability: Gain 1 face-up item to your hand. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per item in your hand.

name: Gearstone
ability: Upgrade. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per upgrade.

name: Bluestone
ability: Gain 1 face-up blue card to your hand. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per blue card you control.
meld: Gain $1 per blue card you control (max $3).

name: Fuelstone
ability: Vanquish. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per turquoise corruption.

name: Cipherstone
ability: Discard a card to activate its ability. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain the previous card’s core value.

name: Purplestone
ability: Gain 1 face-up purple card to your hand. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Guile] per purple card you control.
meld: Gain $1 per purple card you control (max $3).

name: Cullstone
ability: Vanquish. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per 5-value corruption.

name: Aetherstone
ability: Gain 1 face-up meteorite to your hand. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Guile] per meteorite you control.

name: Morphstone
ability: Change a worker to purple; it becomes available. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Power] per purple worker.

name: Meldstone
ability: Meld another meteorite. 2 [PurpleArrow] Gain [Guile] per melded meteorite.

name: Clear the Blockaded Bridge
ability: If you have 0–2 cards in hand, gain 2 [Power]. Otherwise, gain [Guile].

name: Find a Former Factory Engineer
ability: Gain [Guile] OR Upgrade.

name: Interrogate Meteorite Eyewitnesses
ability: Gain [Guile] OR gain an adjacent face–up meteorite.

name: Sweep the Field
ability: Gain [Power] per face–up blue card, then sweep any number of face–up cards.

name: Learn about Tarkovsky's Expedition
ability: Draw 2 cards and keep 1. If you keep a meteorite, gain [Guile].

name: Chart a Course North
ability: Boast. If every opponent is south of you, gain 2 [Power].

name: Save a Lost Lumberjack
ability: Gain [Guile] and rescue a card.

name: Drive off the Marauders
ability: Discard a card to gain 2 [Power].

name: Salvage an Idle Mech
ability: Activate the ability of any face–up item among the locations.

name: Repair a Damaged Mech
ability: Rescue all other cards. If you rescue at least 3 cards this way, gain $3.

name: Hack through Vines to Find a Hidden Entrance
ability: Vanquish. As you do, you may discard up to 3 cards, gaining their core values.

name: Brave the Eerie Tunnel
ability: Sort your location’s corruption into any order. You may Vanquish.

name: Track Tarkovsky's Trail
ability: Gain an exposed benefit from an opponent’s location. That opponent gains [Guile].

name: Trap the Zombies
ability: Gain [Guile] and peek at a location; gain a map if there are no face–down locations.

name: Unearth Some Strange Rocks
ability: If you have no corruption, gain 2 [Guile]. Otherwise, gain 2 [Power].

name: Locate the Meteor Epicenter
ability: Gain the core value of all face–up meteorites.

name: Raze a Corrupted Building
ability: Vanquish. After each corruption you gain, also gain [Guile][Power].

name: Banish the Squatters
ability: Gain the Solve benefit of another quest card you control.

name: Placate Possessed Animals
ability: Pay [Guile] to gain 2 [Power].

name: Resque a Trapped Mercenary
ability: Rescue another card; either gain its core value or activate its ability.

name: Clear a Path into the Town
ability: Gain the core value of all adjacent face–up cards, then sweep only those cards.

name: Search the Mining Town for Fuel and Survivors
ability: Pay [Guile] to gain a worker.

name: Befriend a Local Legend
ability: Gain [Power] OR pay 5x[Power] to gain $3.

name: Cure a Whale of Parasites
ability: Pay [Guile][Power] to gain the top corruption at your location if it’s a 3 or 4.

name: Pillage the Tower
ability: Gain [Power] and/or Vanquish.

name: Scout the Abandoned Base
ability: Pay 2 [Guile] to gain the top corruption from an adjacent location if it’s a 3 or 4.

name: Communicate with the Beast
ability: Pay [Guile] to Meld.

name: Recover a Stolen Map
ability: Gain [Guile] per adjacent revealed location OR gain a map from the general supply.

name: Activate the Ancient
ability: Pay [Guile] to gain 3 [Power].

name: Offer an Arcane Sacrifice
ability: Discard a card to gain either its core value or 1 worker of the color shown on that card.

name: Save a Captive from a Dark Ritual
ability: Rescue another card. If it had a worker on it, gain [Guile][Power].

name: Study Meteorites on the Village Outskirts
ability: Activate the ability of any face–up meteorite.

name: Talk with the Protectors of the Cave
ability: Gain [Power] per available worker.

name: Lure and Confront the Cave Monsters
ability: Transfer the top corruption from each adjacent location to your location.

name: Find a Secret Passage
ability: Trash a map to move to any revealed location and gain [Guile].

name: Hack Robot Guardians
ability: Activate the ability of any other active card.

name: Weaken the Leviathan
ability: Gain 3 [Guile] if your mech is in the North, 2 [Guile] in Central, or [Guile] in the South.

name: Identify Members of a Lost Expedition
ability: Gain [Guile] OR pay 2 [Guile] to gain $2.

name: Close the Vortex
ability: If your location’s top corruption is valued 3, 4, or 5, return it to the bag.

name: Control the Posessed
ability: Activate the ability of any face–up purple card, then gain that card.
